text:
NDSS, along with other leading #Downsyndrome orgs, has signed on in support of the Intellectual and Developmental Disability COVID-19 Vaccination Position Statement from @DSMIG_USA. 

✅Read more about the #COVID19 #vaccine and what you need to know: https://t.co/aos1B305Xp https://t.co/Z3IOB5oMrq
